history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the ORANGE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER I like to go bus transit.
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will provide you with directions to your destination by public transit. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is your destination?
USER I'm going to the wire fence.
TTS Okay, going to welded wire panels. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When would you like to travel?
USER right now
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:51 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER Yes.

TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> I will pause after every step and give you time to write things down. <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Hold on. I'll look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 4 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 1 hour 48 minutes, and you will take 2 busses.<break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 28X <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Liberty avenuenue at Market Street.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 5:10pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER Okay.

TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Take the <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> P78 <break strength='weak'/> to </prosody> <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> Coal Hollow Rd at Frankstown Rd FS.</prosody> It will depart at <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 6:10pm. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER what I'm sorry, but
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Walk for about 5 mins to <break strength='weak'/> <prosody volume='loud'> 10700 Frankstown Rd, Pittsburgh, PA 15235, USA. </prosody> </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Let me know when you're done writing. </speak>
USER anyway Pizza
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER No, I would like to hear the original route over.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER I like to go from the airport.
USER There's a lot of front.
